description: Kira`s Meditite was seen floating beside Kira when they first met Goh and immediately after seeing it, he wanted to catch one of his own. It helped pull Ash Ketchum out of a trap in the Colossus Ruins. During the raid battle against the Golurk in the ruins, it got knocked out but helped enough to allow Goh to catch it.
name: Asanan (Keira)
